author: cnbc.com
title: USI Insurance Services Announces the Closing of the Acquisition ofCHS Insurance
text:
VALHALLA, N.Y., May 08, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- USI Insurance Services (“ USI ”) announced today the closing on the acquisition of CHS Insurance, formerly part of CHS Inc. CHS Insurance is one of the nation’s largest agribusiness insurance brokers and a leading insurance provider of agriculture cooperatives in the United States. It has provided insurance and risk management solutions to agribusiness, food processing, petroleum and agricultural cooperatives for 80 years. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Michael J. Sicard, chairman and CEO, USI, said: “CHS Insurance is recognized as a leader in agribusiness insurance, with a strong dedication to understanding clients’ risks and helping businesses grow. We have a shared culture and common core values, including a networked team approach to bringing exceptional service and expertise to each of our clients. We call it the USI ONE Advantage ® , a unique platform to deliver clients an innovative and better set of risk management and employee benefit solutions with bottom line financial impact. We are excited to welcome the CHS Insurance team to USI. Together we will further invest and expand in serving the needs of agribusiness and communities across the United States.”
Bryan Lewis, president, CHS Insurance, said: “For eight decades we have been providing our clients with insurance and risk management solutions tailored to the agricultural industry. Teaming with USI will allow us to bring clients additional products and services to protect their businesses and employees. We look forward to joining an industry-leader known for their best-in-class solutions including proprietary analytics, local and national resources and team-based planning to help our clients navigate the future.”
A bout USI
USI is one of the largest insurance brokerage and consulting firms in the world, delivering property and casualty, employee benefits, personal risk, program and retirement solutions to large risk management clients, middle market companies, smaller firms and individuals. Headquartered in Valhalla, New York, USI connects together over 6,000 industry leading professionals across more than 150 offices to serve clients’ local, national and international needs. USI has become a premier insurance brokerage and consulting firm by leveraging the USI ONE Advantage ® , an interactive platform that integrates proprietary and innovative client solutions, networked local resources and expertise, and enterprise-wide collaboration to deliver customized results with positive, bottom line impact. USI attracts best-in-class industry talent with a long history of deep and continuing investment in our local communities . For more information, visit usi.com .
